dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of digits from the MNIST dataset, where each digit is colored either red or green. The label is a noisy function of the digit and color, with a probability of flipping the label.
dcterms:title: Colored MNIST

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of digits from the MNIST dataset that have been rotated at various angles. The domain is determined by the degree of rotation.
dcterms:title: Rotated MNIST

dcterms:description: A dataset containing images from various domains including art, cartoons, photos, and sketches, with multiple classes.

dcterms:description: A dataset consisting of images from four different domains: Caltech101, LabelMe, SUN09, and VOC2007, with five classes.

dcterms:description: A large dataset containing images from six different domains: clipart, infograph, painting, quickdraw, real, and sketch, with a total of 345 classes.
dcterms:title: DomainNet
